html:
May 19 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Bayer, Vodafone and Zalando, on Wednesday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Adidas AG ADSGn.DE: Morgan Stanley raises to equal-weight from underweight

* Bayer AG BAYGn.DE: JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

* Sonova Holding AG SOON.S: JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

* Vodafone VOD.L: Credit Suisse cuts target price to 150p from 170p

* Zalando SE ZALG.DE: Credit Suisse raises to outperform from neutral

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Wednesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* Adidas AG ADSGn.DE: Morgan Stanley raises to equal-weight from underweight

* Barco NV BAR.BR: Kepler Cheuvreux raises to buy from hold
